mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_common_task ( common_task_name, common_task_img, common_task_tell, common_task_url, common_task_addr, common_task_lot, common_task_lat, common_task_service_name, common_task_req_page ) VALUES ( #{commonTaskName}, #{commonTaskImg}, #{commonTaskTell}, #{commonTaskUrl}, #{commonTaskAddr}, #{commonTaskLot}, #{commonTaskLat}, #{commonTaskServiceName}, #{commonTaskReqPage} );
